Reviews.Title: “Run run, as fast as you can, You can't stay here unless you like cold showers, pet urine, moldy walls...”
Reviews.Author: cessalee
Reviews.Content: doesnt impress staff thank goodness sometimes thats save property worst residence inn stayed matter worst marriott ive called days reservation correct rewards file low floor yoga insanity mornings try considerate arrival neither added matter available attempting offered run errands prepared final tried offer windows outside lighting dim option told painted deal paint smell windows option solid double paned glass checking didnt notice actually smelled recently freshened hour figured dog urine unfortunately hour unpacked staying 18 nights lot stuff decided deal buy febreeze called front desk spray carpets told time wasnt staying night anyway morning daylight savings time id call maybe breakfast hours extended called informed oh yeah gonna move annoyed wish told originally called urine surely indeed painted animal issues instead hiding pack ready jump shower top theres hot water thats major issue none furniture matches kitchen hasnt remodeled probably 90s dresser drawer options 2 inches falling feet theres mold water damage closet empty 6 pack container refrigerator hear units beside oh mention train runs window 4 minutes time day night overall im stopped paragraphs ago please sanity money nose stay finish positive note staff nice trying people happy unfortunate
